Question
========

Of a population and one sample from it, it is known that $\overline{y} = 105$, $\mu = 100$, $s = 16$ and $\sigma = 15$. In welk interval zou 95% van de steekproefgemiddeldand liggand?

  
Answerlist
----------
* $100\pm1.96×16/\sqrt{n}$
* $105\pm1.96×15/\sqrt{n}$
* $100\pm1.96×15/\sqrt{n}$
* $105\pm1.96×16/\sqrt{n}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
